capsules_submitted.utterance: Petunia's lineage is quite fascinating. I've been studying the maculogy of this particular plant, and it seems that its unique markings are a result of its specific genetic makeup. As far as I know, petunias with this type of maculogy are relatively rare, so it's interesting to see one up close.
